txt.en: The Zhélruka Dwarf Mózhek has asked you to gather delver's plaster, old pitons, and dragon-stone while assisting his people in the Grey Mountains.\n\n<rgb=#FF00FF>These items may be found by defeating foes in Grey Mountains endgame instances. Different instances will yield different types of items!</rgb>
You should deliver the items you collected to Mózhek in Skarháld.
Some needed secondary supplies may be found in the Grey Mountains.
'Ah, there you are [placeholder]. You found the items I asked of you? Please, take this in thanks.'

'While you are out there helping in big ways, you might help in some small ways too. Pebbles hold up boulders, as the saying goes! \n\n'If you come across any delver's plaster, old pitons, or dragon-stone, will you bring them to me? The workers have been asking for more of these of late, and our stores are running low.'

Mózhek's guide to finding secondary resources:
Resource Instances
Steel Keep: crafter's lead, delver's plaster, old pitons
Glimmerdeep: crafter's lead, grey mushrooms, dragon-stone
Thornholt: grey mushrooms, delver's plaster, mineral salts
Withered Heath: scrub-moss, old pitons, dragon-stone, mineral salts

Story Instances
Steel Keep: crafter's lead, mineral salts
Glimmerdeep: grey mushrooms, old pitons
Thrumfall: delver's plaster, dragon-stone
Wanted Pebbles: Delver's Plaster, Old Pitons, and Dragon-stone
